name: Apportation
desc: Transport pickupable items in the target area into your inventory.

name: Blessed Smoke Cloud
desc: Conjure a cloud of thick blessed smoke that makes characters invisible.

name: Blinding Radiance
desc: Enemies around you receive [X] air damage. Every enemy withint a 5m radius turns blind. 100% chance to cast an aura for 1 turn.

name: Breathing Bubble
desc: Creates a bubble of clean air around your head, allowing you to ignore effects of cloud surfaces. Immune to Suffocation and Silence. Sets Breathing Bubble for 5 turn(s).

name: Chain Lightning
desc: Shoot a stunning bolt of lightning that forks up to 8 times in a 8m radius and deals [X] Air Damage to each target. Sets Shocked for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence

name: Closed Circuit
desc: Deals [X] Air Damage to enemies around you; then creates cursed static clouds on the edges of the spell Sets Air Immunity for 1 turn(s). Sets Shocked for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence

name: Dazing Bolt
desc: An electrical bolt falls from the sky, dealing [X] Air Damage to characters and items in the area, and setting Shocked status. Sets Shocked for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

name: Electric Discharge
desc: An electrical jolt deals air damage to target character. Sets status Shocked. Sets shocked for 2 turns. Damage is based on skill level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

name: Erratic Wisp
desc: Cause target character to teleport in a random direction each time they are attacked. Increases Air Resistance by 40%. Sets Erratic Wisp for 2 turn(s).

name: Evasive Aura
desc: Sets Evasive Aura for you and allies around you. Dodging chance is increased by 90% and your Movement Speed is increased by 1m. Sets Erratic Wisp for 1 turn(s).

name: Favourable Wind
desc: Control the forces of nature so the wind is literally at your party's back. An aura increases you allies' movement speeds while they stay close to you. Sets Favourable Winds Aura for 4 turn(s).

name: Mass Breathing Bubbles
desc: Set Breathing Bubbles on allies around you, allowing them to ignore effects of cloud surfaces and making them immune to Suffocation and Silence. Sets Mass Breathing Bubbles for 5 turn(s).

name: Nether Swamp
desc: Make two characters switch places. One of the characters can be you. Sets Nether Swap for 1 turn(s).

name: Pressure Spike
desc: Condense all cloud surfaces in the area. Deals air damage to enemies and douses fire. Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

name: Shocking Touch
desc: Stuns nearby enemies and deals [X] air damage. Sets shocked for 2 turns. Damage is based on skill level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

name: Smoke Cover
desc: Create a smoke cloud around you, hiding from sight.

name: Superconductor
desc: Shoot forking spikes at all enemies within the area, dealing [X] Air Damage and setting Shocked. Sets Shocked for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

name: Teleportation
desc: Teleport a target character or item to a point of your choosing. Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

name: Thunderstorm
desc: A storm rages in the target area, hitting enemies with lightning bolts for 3 turns.

name: Tornado
desc: A tornado moves randomly around the battlefield, removing surfaces and revealing invisible characters. Also clears Invisible, Burning and Slowed.

name: Uncanny Evasion
desc: Target character's dodging is increased by 90% and your Movement Speed is increased by 20%. Sets Evading for 1 turn(s).

name: Vacuum Aura
desc: Deal [X] Air Damage to enemies in the area. Caster receives an aura that sets Silence and Suffocating on enemies. Sets Vacuum Aura for 3 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.

name: Vacuum Touch
desc: Deal [X] Air Damage. Set Suffocation and Silence on target. Sets Suffocating for 1 turn(s). Sets Silenced for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

name: Vaporize
desc: Remove Petrified and Frozen from target character. Vaporise ground surfaces into clouds. Does not work on Oil, Ice or Lava surfaces

name: Acid Spores
desc: Shoot spores of corrosive acid, dealing [X] Poison Damage. Set Poisoned for 3 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

name: Contamination
desc: Deals [X] Poison Damage to enemies and undead allies around you and can poison them. Turns water, blood surfaces and clouds in to poison! Set Poisoned for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

name: Corrosive Spray
desc: Destroy [X] Physical Armour physical  on targets in a cone, and set Acid and Atrophy Set Acid for 2 turn(s). Set Atrophy for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

name: Corrosive Touch
desc: Destroy [X] Physical Armour on target character, and set Acid status. Set Acid for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

name: Dust Blast
desc: Throw dust at all enemies in range, blinding them and dealing [X] Earth Damage. Set Blinded for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

name: Earthquake
desc: Deals [X] Earth Damage and Knockdown enemy characters and items around you. Creates 8 random oil surfaces within the area. Set Knocked Down for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

name: Fortify
desc: Provides [X] Physical Armour. While Fortified, the target cannot be teleported. Removes Poisoned, Bleeding, Burning, Acid, Decaying. Set Fortified for 3 turn(s).

name: Fossil Strike
desc: A giant rock with sticky oil that deals [X] Earth Damage. Creates an oil surface where it lands. Damage is bases on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

name: Impalement
desc: Spikes impale all characters and items, setting Crippled and dealing [X] Earth Damage. Also creates an oil puddle. Set Crippled for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

name: Living Wall
desc: Vines sprout from the ground to block the path in the target area, emitting poison clouds around them.

name: Mass Oily Carapace
desc: Each ally consumes oil surfaces around them, converting the oil surfaces to Physical Armour physical. Removed Slowed. Restore up to 34 Physical Armour, depending on relevant surface area.

name: Mend Metal
desc: Allies near you start slowly regenerating Physical Armour. Restore [X] Physical Armour for 3 turn(s).

name: Oily Carapace
desc: Consume oil surfaces around you and convert them to Physical Armour. Removes Slowed. Restore up to 34 Physical Armour, depending on relevant surface area.

name: Poison Dart
desc: Cast a magical poisonous dart that does [X] Poison Damage, and creates a puddle of poison. Set Poisoned for 3 turn(s). Damage is bases on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

name: Poison Wave
desc: Poison erupts from the caster in a circular wave, dealing [X] Poison Damage and forming poison clouds. Gives immunity to poison and earth damage for 1 turn. Set Earth Immunity for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

name: Pyroclastic Eruption
desc: Multiple oil-filled rocks erupt from the caster at all enemies in the area. On impact, they create oil surfaces and deal [X] Earth Damage. Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

name: Reactive Armor
desc: Deal [X] Physical Damage, based on your current Physical Armour, in a wave of metal spikes to everyone in the area (including yourself). Damage is based on your current Physical Armour.

name: Siphon Poison
desc: Remove poison surfaces and clouds. Gain poison damage bonus to weapon attacks and weapon-based skills (dependent upon size of poison area cleared). Set Siphon Poison for 2 turn(s).

name: Summon Artillery Plant
desc: Plant can lob acidic spores and emit cursed poison clouds. The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

name: Throw Dust
desc: Throw dust at a character, blinding them and dealing [X] Earth Damage. Clears surfaces and clouds in the area. Set Blinded for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

name: Turn to Oil
desc: Turn water and blood surfaces into oil. Remove Stun and Shocked from characters.

name: Venom Coating
desc: Coat your weapon with poison, adding [X] Poison Damage to your weapon skills and attacks. Set Venom Coating for 2 turn(s).

name: Venomous Aura
desc: Allies in range receive Venom Coating, which adds [X] Poison Damage to weapon skills and attacks. Set Venomous Aura for 4 turn(s).

name: Worm Tremor
desc: Deals [X] Earth Damage to each character in the area. At your command, poisonous worms slither up from the earth, attaching to every character in the area who is not protected by Magical Armour . Affected characters cannot move or teleport, and they receive [X] Poison Damage each turn. Set Entangled for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.

name: Arrow Spray
desc: Fire 16 arrows in a 60 degree arc. Each arrow deals 40% damage.
special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Arrow Storm
desc: 16 arrows fall from the sky in the target area, each dealing 40% damage.
special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Assassinate
desc: Attacking your target with meticulous aim, dealing 135% damage in one shot. When performed from stealth, this attack gains a 50% damage increase.
special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Ballistic Shot
desc: A shot that deals 100% damage and receives 5% bonus damage per 1m distance to target.
special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Barrage
desc: Fire three arrows at three targets of your choice, each dealing 60% damage.
special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Elemental Arrowheads
desc: Target a surface in melee radius. For one turn, elemental damage matching that surface is added to your ranged weapon attacks and ranged weapon-based skills.

name: Farsight
desc: Increase the range of a targeted character's ranged attacks and skills by 4m.

name: First Aid
desc: Heals target for [X] Vitality. Cures Crippled, Atrophy, Knocked Down, Blind, Silenced, Bleeding, Burning, Poisoned, and Diseased.
special: Restore [X] Vitality. Set Rested for 1 turn(s).

name: Glitter Dust
desc: Target is marked, reducing its ability to dodge. Prevents target from going invisible.

name: Marksman's Fang
desc: Shoot an arrow that goes straight through enemies. Each enemy that's hit takes 100% damage, ignoring armour.
special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Pin Down
desc: Deals 120% damage and Cripples target character.
special: Set Crippled for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Reactive Shot
desc: Target a circular area. Until your next turn, you will reflexively shoot at the first three enemies moving within this area.

name: Ricochet
desc: Fire a normal arrow that deals 90% damage and then finds another target within 5m. Forks up to 2 times.
special: Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Sky Shot
desc: Leap into the air before shooting, gaining damage bonuses for your superior height. Deals 100% Damage.
special: This skill receives high ground bonuses regardless of elevation. Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.

name: Tactical Retreat
desc: Apply haste to yourself, then teleport away from imminent danger.

name: Arcane Stitch
desc: Fully restore target character's Magic Armour. Removes Frozen, Stunned, Petrified, Plague, Suffocating, Poisoned, Burning, Necrofire, Terrified, Silenced, Taunted, Mad. Restore [X] Magic Armour.

name: Armour of Frost
desc: Ice forms a defensive barrier around the target, providing [X] Magical Armour. Cures Burning, Poisoned, Stunned, Frozen, Suffocating and Petrified. Sets Magic Shell for 3 turn(s).

name: Cleanse Wounds
desc: Heal target and create a water puddle beneath them. Remove Burning, Diseased, Decaying Touch, Poisoned and Bleeding. Restore [X] Vitality

name: Cryogenic Stasis
desc: Target ally enters Cryogenic Stasis. Though incapacitated, they become immune to all damage, and heal over time. Removes Shackles Of Pain. Sets Permafrost for 1 Turn(s).

name: Cryotherapy
desc: Consume Frozen surfaces around you and convert them to Magic Armour. Removes Burning and Necrofire. Restore up to 34 Magic Armour depending on relevant surface area.

name: Cryogenic Stasis
desc: Target ally enters Cryogenic Stasis. Though incapacitated, they become immune to all damage, and heal over time. Removes Shackles Of Pain.

name: Deep Freeze
desc: Targets in the cone that are frozen and under 10% Vitality shatter and instantly die. Otherwise they receive [X] Water Damage and become Frozen. Set Frozen for 1 Turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

name: Global Cooling
desc: Set Chilled on enemies around you and deal [X] Water Damage. Freeze all succeptible surfaces. Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

name: Hail Storm
desc: 20 ice shards fall from the sky, each dealing [X] Water Damage to characters within 13m range from impact. Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

name: Hail Strike
desc: Icicles fall from the sky, chilling enemies and dealing [X] water damage. They create Ice surfaces where they hit the ground. Damages is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.

name: Healing Ritual
desc: Shoot a bolt of healing energy that will jump to nearby allies. Restore 7 Vitality

name: Healing Tears
desc: Three healing tears circle around you. Everytime an ally walks into melee range near you, a healing tear bathes them. Set Healing Tears for 3 Turn(s)

name: Ice Fan
desc: Target 3 positions and shoot an ice shard at each one, dealing [X] Water Damage and making targets Chilled. Set Chilled for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

name: Mass Cleanse Wounds
desc: Heal yourself and allies around you. Create a water puddle beneath every target. Remove Necrofire, Burning, Diseased, Decaying Touch, Poisoned, Bleeding, Suffocation and Acid. Restore 15 Vitality

name: Mass Cryotherapy
desc: Each ally consumes Frozen surfaces around them, converting the frozen surfaces to Magic Armour. Removes Burning and Necrofire. Restore up to 34 Magic Armour depending on relevant surface area.

name: Rain
desc: Create a spreading water surface which douses fires. Set Wet status on characters in the area.

name: Restoration
desc: Restore Vitality of a target character. Restoration also cures Poisoned and Bleeding. Restore [X] Vitality for 2 turn(s).

name: Soothing Cold
desc: Regenerate Magical Armour for all alies around caster. Restore [x] Magic Armour for 3 turn(s).

name: Steam Lance
desc: Releases a stream of Blessed Steam that heals characters in its path. Restore 6 Vitality for 3 Turn(s)

name: Vampiric Hunger
desc: Set Vampiric Hunger on target character, adding 50% Life Steal for 2 turns. Life Steal heals you in proportion to the damage you deal to Vitality. Set Vampiric Hunger for 2 Turn(s)

name: Vampiric Hunger Aura
desc: Set Vampiric Hunger Aura on every ally around you, adding 50% Life Steal for 2 turns. Life Steal heals you in proportion to the damage you deal to Vitality. Set Vampiric Hunger Aura for 2 Turn(s)

name: Winter Blast
desc: Deal [X] Water Damage and set Chilled status on characters in the area. Freeze blood and water surfaces. Set Chilled for 2 turn(s). Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.

name: Black Shroud
desc: Create a cloud of cursed smoke in an area, setting Suffocating and Blind on all characters within.

name: Blood Storm
desc: The sky weeps bloody tears. Bolts of coagulated blood fall on enemy characters in the area, setting Disease and Decaying Touch. Turns all water in the area into blood.

name: Blood Sucker
desc: Target character consumes blood surfaces around them, restoring Vitality. The more blood, the more they are healed! Restores up to [X] Vitality.

name: Bone Cage
desc: Increases Physical Armour by [X] and another [X] Physical Armour for each corpse in the area around you.

name: Death Wish
desc: Target character receives a damage bonus equal to the percentage of their lost Vitality. For example, a character with 30% Vitality will gain a 70% damage bonus. Sets Death Wish for 2 turn(s).

name: Decaying Touch
desc: Deal [X] physical damage to target character. Sets Decay for 2 turn(s), so the target will take piercing damage from healing spells and potions.

name: Grasp of the Starved
desc: Undead hands rise from underground, attacking characters that stand in blood surfaces and clouds. Deals [X] physical damage to each character and sets Crippled for 2 turn(s).

name: Infect
desc: Deal [X] physical damage. Infect a target for 2 turn(s) with a disease that will spread to other nearby characters. Diseased characters deal reduced damage with all attacks and have lowered Constitution.

name: Last Rites
desc: Sacrifice yourself to bring an ally back to life. Deals [X] piercing damage to you, and resurrects target character with maximum Vitality.

name: Living on the Edge
desc: For 2 turns your character's Vitality cannot be reduced below 1 point, keeping them alive against all odds. If the target is a summon, their lifetime will be prolonged for the duration. Sets Death Resist for 2 turn(s)

name: Mosquito Storm
desc: Unleash a swarm of giant mosquitos to suck the blood from your enemies, dealing physical damage and healing yourself. Restore up to [X] Vitality, depending on the damage dealt. Set Bleeding for 2 turn(s).

name: Raining Blood
desc: Create blood surfaces. Set Bleeding on enemies for 2 turn(s). Douse fire surfaces.

name: Raise Bloated Corpse
desc: Target a corpse to raise a bloated cadaver that fights for you. It can explode your target, dealing Physical Damage.

name: Raise Bone Widow
desc: Raise a walking pile of bones which can consume corpses to restore Vitality and receive a stacking damage buff. The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

name: Shackles of Pain
desc: Mark a target so that it will receive all of the damage you receive. Sets Shackles of Pain for 3 turn(s).

name: Silencing Stare
desc: Destroy [X-Y] Magic Armour and Silences all enemies in a cone in front of you. Sets Silenced for 1 turn.

name: Totems of the Necromancer
desc: Spawn bone totems near every enemy (alive or dead) in the area. Bone totems have ranged attacks that deal [x] physical damage.

name: Apotheosis
desc: You take the first step towards godhood. The cost of all Source skills are reduced by -3 Source Points. Active for 2 turn(s).

name: Bull Horns
desc: Magnificent horns sprout from your forehead, making you see red. You can rush at your enemies and gore them. Increases Retribution ability by 1 for the duration. Incompatible with Medusa Head. Sets Bull Horns for 4 turn(s).

name: Chameleon Cloak
desc: Grants you the ability to blend in with any enviroment as if invisible.

name: Chicken Claw
desc: Turn the target character into a chicken for 2 turn(s). Squawk!

name: Equalise
desc: Vitality and Armour percentages of characters in target area are summed up and redistributed equally.

name: Flaming Skin
desc: You get immunity to fire, but lowered resistance to water. You bleed fire. Active for 2 turn(s).

name: Flay Skin
desc: Destroy [X] Magic Armour on target character. Set Nullified Resistance for 3 turn(s).

name: Forced Exchange
desc: Exchange Vitality percentages with target character.

name: Heart of Steel
desc: Your heart pumps liquid metal, creating a robust layer of Physical Armor. This regenerates each turn. Restore [X] Physical Armor for 4 turn(s).

name: Icy Skin
desc: You get immunity to water, but lowered resistance to fire. You bleed ice. Active for 2 turn(s).

name: Jellyfish Skin
desc: Bleed electrified water. You get immunity to electricity, but lowered resistance to poison and earth damage. Active for 2 turn(s).

name: Medusa Head
desc: Snakes grow out of your head, giving you a petrifying aura and the Petrifying Visage skill. Incompatible with Bull Horns. Active for 2 turn(s).

name: Poisonous Skin
desc: You get immunity to poison and earth, but lowered resistance to air. You bleed poison. Active for 2 turn(s).

name: Skin Graft
desc: Reset all cooldowns. Removes Burning, Necrofire, Poisoned and Bleeding.

name: Spider Legs
desc: Spider legs burst from your back. You can create web surfaces in an area to entangle foes. Incompatible with Wings. Active for 3 turn(s).

name: Spread Your Wings
desc: Sprout temporary wings to fly when you move, allowing you to ignore ground surfaces. Incompatible with Spider Legs. Active for 3 turn(s).

name: Summon Oily Blob
desc: Fling an Oil Blob at a target point, dealing [X] Earth Damage in the area. Oil Blob deals earth damage with melee attacks and leaves an oil puddle on death. 3m explode radius.

name: Tentacle Lash
desc: Lash out at your opponent dealing, physical damage and setting Atrophy on them for 1 turn(s).

name: Terrain Transmutation
desc: Target two circular areas. Swap surfaces and clouds.

name: Bleed Fire
desc: Enemies will bleed fire when hit. Also creates a small fire area beneath each target and ignites surfaces in the area. Active for 3 turn(s).

name: Corpse Explosion
desc: Explode the target corpse, dealing physical damage in the area

name: Deploy Mass Traps
desc: Throw 4 explosive traps at target locations. Each trap takes a turn to activate. When active, trap will explode when a character approaches it.

name: Epidemic of Fire
desc: Fire a cursed flame that will fork on impact up to 5 times, dealing [X] Fire Damage and leaving a cursed fire surface in its wake. Sets Necrofire for 2 turn(s).

name: Fire Whip
desc: Long-range attack that deals [X] Fire Damage to a single target, leaving them blind and burning. Sets Blind for 1 turn and Burning for 1 turn.

name: Fireball
desc: Hurl a fiery sphere that will explode, dealing [X] Fire Damage. Set Burning for 2 turn(s).

name: Firebrand
desc: An aura that adds [X] fire damage to weapon skills and attacks for all allies within an 8m radius.

name: Flaming Crescendo
desc: Curse the target to explode (3m explode radius) in 1 turns or on death.

name: Flaming Tongues
desc: Flaming tongues protect you, immediately attacking approaching enemies. Sets Flaming Tongues for 3 turn(s).

name: Haste
desc: Sets Hasted on target character for 2 turn(s). Hasted increases movement speed by 2m per AP and gives an additional 1 AP per turn. Clears Slowed and Crippled.

name: Ignition
desc: Sets enemy characters around you on fire. Deals [X] fire damage to each. Ignites all susceptible surfaces for 2 turn(s).

name: Laser Ray
desc: Line of intense heat that deals [X] Fire Damage to characters and leaves fire clouds behind. Sets Burning for 2 turn(s).

name: Mass Corpse Explosion
desc: Explode all corpses around you, dealing physical damage in the area.

name: Mass Sabotage
desc: Explode 2 random grenades or arrows in the inventories of any enemy in a target circle.

name: Master of Sparks
desc: Target character and surrounding allies receive Sparkmaster status that adds a chance of fiery sparks to melee attacks. Sets Sparkmaster for 2 turn(s).

name: Meteor Shower
desc: 25 fireballs come crashing from the sky. Each does [X] Fire Damage within a 3m range from impact.

name: Peace of Mind
desc: Target gains Clear-Minded for 3 turn(s), which increases Strength, Finesse, Intelligence by 2 and Wits by 5. Removes Blinded, Terrified, Charmed, Taunted, Sleeping, Enraged and Mad.

name: Sabotage
desc: If target character is carrying grenades or arrows, a random one explodes in their inventory. Explodes 1 random Arrow(s) or Grenade(s) on target's inventory.

name: Searing Daggers
desc: Shoot 3 flaming daggers at targets of your choice, each creating a fire surface and dealing [X] fire damage. Sets Burning for 2 turn(s).

name: Sparking Swings
desc: Receive Sparkstriker status for 3 turn(s). This causes your melee attacks to create a spark projectile that bounces off the initial target to hit the closest enemy. Has 4 charges.

name: Spontaneous Combustion
desc: Deal [X] Fire Damage to target character. If the character is affected by Burning or Necrofire, remove those statuses and deal additional damage for each turn of duration remaining.

name: Summon Fire Slug
desc: Summon a Fire Slug. Your Fire Slug can create fire surfaces and launch linear fire attacks. The stats of the summon will depend on the caster's level and summoning ability. Active for 5 turns.

name: Supernova
desc: Explode, creating fire surfaces and dealing [X] Fire Damage in a large area around you (except areas blocked by obstacles).

name: Throw Explosive Trap
desc: Throw an explosive trap at target locations. Trap takes a turn to activate. When active, trap will explode when a character approaches it.

name: Adrenaline
desc: Gain 2 Action Points immediately, but lose 2 Action Points next turn. Any Action Points over your maximum are lost. Does not break Invisibility or Sneaking.

name: Backlash
desc: Jump over the enemy, landing behind their back and backstabbing them for [X] physical damage. 100% chance to Backstab.

name: Chloroform
desc: Throw a knife at your opponent, dealing [X] physical damage. Can backstab.

name: Cloak and Dagger
desc: Teleport without breaking sneaking. Does not break Invisibility or Sneaking.

name: Corrupted Blade
desc: Dagger attack that deals [X] physical damage and sets Decay and Diseased. Set Decaying for 2 turn(s). Set Diseased for 2 turn(s).

name: Daggers Drawn
desc: Whirl into a barrage of 5 stabs, each dealing [X] physical damage.

name: Fan of Knives
desc: Fling a dagger at every enemy around you, dealing [X] physical damage. Can backstab.

name: Gag Order
desc: Destroy [X] Magic Armour on target character. Silence target for 1 turn.

name: Mortal Blow
desc: Deal [140% weapon] physical damage. Damage is doubled if you are sneaking or invisible. Target is killed instantly if below 20% Viality.

name: Rupture Tendons
desc: Deal [X] physical damage to target character. When they try to move, they will take piercing damage. Set Ruptured Tendons for 2 turn(s).

name: Sawtooth Knife
desc: Pierce the enemy's Physical Armour and directly deals [X] piercing damage. Sets Bleeding if enemy has no Physical Armour for 3 turn(s).

name: Sleeping Arms
desc: Deal [X] physical damage and set Atrophy: your target can't use weapons or weapon skills anymore. Set Atrophy for 2 turn(s).

name: Terrifying Cruelty
desc: Dagger attack that deals [X] physical damage and sets Bleeding and Fear on target character. Set Bleeding for 3 turn(s)and set Terrified for 1 turn(s).

name: Throwing Knife
desc: Throw a knife at your opponent, dealing [X] physical damage. Can backstab.

name: Wind-Up Toy
desc: Summon a mechanical bomber at the target point. The bomber can explode, dealing fire damage and producing a fire surface. Does not break Invisibility or Sneaking. The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

name: Acid Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to acid, unlocking Poison Dart and Corrosive Spray.

name: Cannibalise
desc: Destroy an allied summon or totem. Receive their Vitality, Physical Armour and Magic Armour.

name: Conjure Incarnate
desc: Conjure a personal elemental that matches the ground surface it's summoned onto. Your incarnate can be buffed with Infusions. Once you hit Summoning ability level of 10, a colossal Incarnate Champion will answer your summons! The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability. Duration 10 turn(s).

name: Cursed Electric Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to cursed electricity, unlocking Electric Discharge and Closed Circuit.

name: Dimensional Bolt
desc: Shoot a volatile bolt that deals [X] of a random type, and then creates a corresponding surface.

name: Dominate Mind
desc: Charm target non-allied character, causing them to join your side in combat for the duration of the status.

name: Door to Eternity
desc: Give all summons around you a status that prevents them from dying to damage or disappearing when their life runs out. Sets Persisting for 2 turn(s).

name: Electric Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to electricity, unlocking Electric Discharge.

name: Elemental Totem
desc: Target a ground surface and conjure a totem of the corresponding element. Each turn, this totem will fire a projectile at enemies in sight. The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability. Duration 3 turn(s).

name: Ethereal Storm
desc: Unpredictable projectiles from distant planes strike target area, dealing random elemental damage to enemies or healing allies. Active for 2 turn(s).

name: Farsight Infusion
desc: Unlock a ranged attack for your Incarnate. Provides [X] Magic Armour (amount depends on your level).

name: Fire Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to fire, unlocking Fireball.

name: Ice Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to blessed ice, unlocking Restoration and Healing Ritual.

name: Necrofire Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to necrofire, unlocking Fireball and Epidemic of Fire.

name: Planar Gateway
desc: Conjure two linked gateways that allow any character to instantly travel between them. Active for 10 turn(s).

name: Poison Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to poison, unlocking Poison Dart.

name: Power Infusion
desc: Unlock Whirlwind  and Rush for your Incarnate. Provides [X] Physical Armour (amount depends on your level).

name: Rallying Cry
desc: Target character regenerates [X] Vitality and [X] Magic Armour according to the number of allied characters and totems in their vicinity.

name: Shadow Infusion
desc: Incarnate learns how to go invisible and strike foes with a corrosive slash. Unlocks skills equal in effect to Chameleon Cloak and Corrupted Blade.

name: Soul Mate
desc: Bind yourself to target character, copying any healing and Armour restoration that you receive to them. Clears Frozen, Stunned, Knocked Down and Petrified. Sets Soul Mate for e turn(s).

name: Summon Cat Familiar
desc: Summons a black cat by your side. Cat can leap, claw, and swap places with it's summoner.

name: Summon Condor
desc: Summons a condor that will aid you in combat. The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

name: Summon Dragonling
desc: Summons a newt to help you in combat. The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.

name: Summon Inner Demon
desc: Conjure a demon that will share their Intelligence with you and provide [X] Magic Armour. Grants you power to terrify and protect yourself with demonic fists. Active for 3 turn(s).

name: Supercharger
desc: Target totem or summon deals 100% more base damage during its next turn, but then it dies. Sets Supercharged for 2 turn(s).

name: Warp Infusion
desc: Incarnate learns a teleport skill and a skill to swap places with its master. These skills are equivalent in effect to Tactical Retreat and the Black Cat summon's swap skill.

name: Water Infusion
desc: Change Incarnate's element to water, unlocking Restoration.

name: Battering Ram
desc: Rush forward in a straight line, to a designated point, hitting all enemies in your path for 50% damage and setting Knockdown. Set Knocked Down for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from [Weapon Attribute].

name: Battle Stomp
desc: Smash your weapon into the ground, knocking down non-allied characters in front of you, and hitting them for 60% damage. Also clears non-cursed surfaces and clouds. Set Knocked Down for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Strength.

name: Blitz Attack
desc: Jump from one target to another, hitting up to 2 targets, dealing 70% damage to each. Targets are chosen randomly in a 10m radius. Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Strength.

name: Bouncing Shield
desc: Throw your shield at an enemy dealing [X] Physical Damage. Shield can bounce to another enemy in 5m range. Damage is based on the Physical Armour of your shield.

name: Challenge
desc: Mark target enemy. If they die in the next 2 turns, you are healed and receive damage and armour bonuses. If target survives, their Vitality is healed to full and caster receives damage.

name: Crippling Blow
desc: Cripple the target with a sweeping blow, and all characters around it. Deals 115% damage. Set Crippled for 1 turn(s). Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from [Weapon Attribute].

name: Deflective Barrier
desc: Projectiles that hit you are reflected back at the caster. This does not prevent the original projectile effects. Provides [X] Physical Armour. Set Deflecting for 3 turn(s).

name: Enrage
desc: Motivate an allied character with the power of rage. Target allied character is garaunteed to land critical hits with basic attacks and weapon skills, but is muted. Clears Taunted, Terrified, Charmed, Mad and Clear-Minded statuses. Set Enraged for 1 turn(s).

name: Guardian Angel
desc: Allies in melee range redirect 50% of received damage to you. Set Guardian Angel Aura for 2 turn(s).

name: Onslaught
desc: Attack five times with astonishing speed, each hit dealing 50% weapon damage.

name: Overpower
desc: Deals 150% weapon damage. If your Physical Armour is higher than your opponent's, destroy all their Physical Armour. Set Knocked Down for 1 turn(s).

name: Phoenix Dive
desc: Leap through the air to a target position, creating a fire surface upon landing.

name: Provoke
desc: Taunt the enemies around you. Provoke and tease them so that they want to attack you. Set Taunted for 1 turn(s).

name: Thick of the Fight
desc: The more the merrier! Gain a damage boost for every nearby character. Set Thick of the Fight for 2 turn(s).

name: Whirlwind
desc: Perform a whirlwind attack, hitting enemies around you for 100% weapon damage.
